Sentencas: It is well known that the introduction of buffer layers can enhance the electrical performance of SSOFCs.
Titulo: Investigation of Ce-based buffer layers on electrochemical performance of YSZ-based symmetric solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Hence, we studied varying ratios of Gd-doped CeO2 as a buffer layer and applied it to YSZ-based SSOFCs.
Titulo: Investigation of Ce-based buffer layers on electrochemical performance of YSZ-based symmetric solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results demonstrate that the performance is enhanced by adding a buffer layer to the single cell, which is superior compared to that without the buffer layer.
Titulo: Investigation of Ce-based buffer layers on electrochemical performance of YSZ-based symmetric solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The highest performance was obtained when Ce0.8Gd0.2O2-delta (GDC20) was used as the buffer layer.
Titulo: Investigation of Ce-based buffer layers on electrochemical performance of YSZ-based symmetric solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results suggest the use of GDC series buffer layers as an attractive strategy to optimize the performance loss due to electrolyte-electrode interactions.
Titulo: Investigation of Ce-based buffer layers on electrochemical performance of YSZ-based symmetric solid oxide fuel cells
